will have extensive experience in frontend technologies including HTML5 CSS JavaScript and AJAX In addition the candidate should have expertise in serverside languages such as PHP Python and Java including experience with one or more PHP frameworks eg Laravel Symfony CodeIgniter CakePHP etc Candidate must also be wellgrounded in basic UIUX design principles with a deep understanding of
